author: akarasulu
msg: Solved bug in Jira http://nagoya.apache.org/jira/browse/DIRSNICKERS-91 where
the order of encoding was being flipped due to child tuple additions to the
back of the child tuple list.  By adding to the front now instead of the back
the order of attribute values is maintained NOT flipped.  This way attribute
comparisions where order is significant works properly when snickers encoders
are used.

author: ekoneil
msg: Data grid test updates.
Adding a simple JSP test to make sure an empty grid columns tag works correctly.
BB: self
BVT: NetUI pass

author: akarasulu
msg: Caused a bug when we set default's in the result errorMessage and matchedDn
fields.  We have reverted to the old way with null defaults but have braced for
possible side effects.
Also note that although for errorMessage both "" and null are considered
equivalent this is not the same for the matchedDn feild because "" is
considered a valid DN.  So "" does not really correspond to null in this
case.

author: akarasulu
msg: various encoders hooked in
